51_Hf01_BlCM_Ct_H3K4me1_B_1: Sarah Kinkley (kinkley@molgen.mpg.de) Na Li (nali@molgen.mpg.de) Ho-Ryun Chung (chung@molgen.mpg.de)
Epigenomics Lab at the Max Planck Institute for Molecular Genetics
Lysis (100mM NaCl, 50 mM Tris-HCl pH8.1, 0.2% NaN3, 1%SDS, 3% Triton X-100) dilution for sonification to 0.33% SDS with (50 mM Tris-HCl pH8.6, 100mM NaCl, 5mM EDTA pH 8.0, 0.2% NaN3)
similar or better than KAPA HiFi polymerase
Agencourt AMPure XP Beads (Beckman Coulter, A63881)
6 Steps: 1 Cycle: 72°C for 3 min; 1 Cycle: 85°C for 2 min; 1 Cycle: 98°C for 2 min; 4 Cycles: 98°C for 20 sec, 67°C 20 sec, 72°C for 50sec;12 Cycles: 98°C for 20 sec, 72°C for 50 sec; Hold at 4°C
Fragment size distribution from 200 bp to 600 bp
0.5 AMPure XP Bead mixture (to remove fragments greater than 1000bp) and 0.85AMPure XP Bead mixture (to remove fragments smaller than 200bp)

Auto Histone ChIP Kit (Diagenode). Indirect method. ChIP_16_IPure_200_15h antibody incubation and 10h bead incubation 5 min washes. Decrosslink ON at 65°C; Rnase A 30 min at 37°C; Proteinase K treatment 4 h at 55°C. Purification by Phenol Chloroform Extraction and ON precipitation
20 µl (although we only used 10 µl beads, but the 20 µl program due to the ChIP volume)
magnetic beads A from Auto histone kit (Diagenode)
